SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_NEEDPHOTOUPDATED
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Used to add/delete 'Need photo updated' pending reasons.
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_NEEDPHOTOUPDATED( @childIDList dbo.USR_UDT_CHILDIDLIST readonly, -- The children to be made eligible or pending @changeAgentID uniqueidentifier, -- Used to specify change agent for CHANGEDBYID and ADDEDBYID fields @deletedRows int = 0 output, -- Output parm that specifies how many pending reasons were deleted @insertedRows int = 0 output -- Output parm that specifies how many pending reasons were inserted ) as begin -- Eligibility code value constants declare @eligibilityCode_Pending tinyint = 0 declare @eligibilityCode_Eligible tinyint = 1 declare @eligibilityCode_Ineligible tinyint = 2
-- How old a photo can be and still be valid in months declare @photoValidAge int set @photoValidAge = 30
declare @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility tinyint = 0
declare @sponsorshipReason_NeedPhotoUpdated nvarchar(100) = 'Need photo updated' declare @errorMessageNeedPhotoupdatedNotfound nvarchar(500) = 'Couldn''t find the "' + @sponsorshipReason_NeedPhotoUpdated + '" Sponsorship Reason'
-- Get ChangeAgent if none was passed into the sproc if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
-- Used for setting date fields to today's date declare @CurrentDate datetime = null set @CurrentDate = getdate()
begin try -- These are required for the sproc to work correctly, so we need to throw an exception if the IDs aren't found declare @needPhotoUpdatedID uniqueidentifier select @needPhotoUpdatedID = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = lower (@sponsorshipReason_NeedPhotoUpdated) and REASONTYPECODE = @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility if @needPhotoUpdatedID is null RAISERROR 1000000 @errorMessageNeedPhotoUpdatedNotfound end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
-- This needs to be set to off for the output parms to be set properly set nocount off
-- Remove 'Need Photo Updated' pending reasons if CURRENTPHOTODATE is current
delete dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON so_reason
where -- Find children who are specified to be reviewed and have the 'Need Photo Updated' pending reason exists (select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID from @childIDList where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = so_reason.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID ) and so_reason.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @needPhotoUpdatedID /* -- Check if CURRENTPHOTODATE is valid (Photo is recent) and exists ( select ID from dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION where CURRENTPHOTODATE is not null and CURRENTPHOTODATE >= dateadd (mm, (@photoValidAge * -1), getdate()) and SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = so_reason.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID )
*/ set @DELETEDROWS = @@ROWCOUNT
/* -- Insert 'Need Photo Updated' pending reason if CURRENTPHOTODATE is null (Photo has not been Updated) insert dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON (SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, SPONSORSHIPREASONID, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED)
select ID, @needPhotoUpdatedID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CurrentDate, @CurrentDate
from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so
where exists (select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID from @childIDList where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = so.ID )
-- Verify that the children do not already have a 'Need Photo Updated' pending reason and not exists (select so_reason.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON so_reason where so_reason.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @needPhotoUpdatedID and so_reason.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID)
-- Check if CURRENTPHOTODATE is too old and not exists (select ID from dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION where CURRENTPHOTODATE is not null and CURRENTPHOTODATE >= dateadd (mm, (@photoValidAge * -1), getdate()) and SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = so.ID )
-- Don't add to ineligible kids that are not quota waiting list and (so.ELIGIBILITYCODE in (@eligibilityCode_Pending, @eligibilityCode_Eligible) or (so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Ineligible and exists (select sponsorshipReasonID from dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDQUOTA_GETWAITINGLISTREASONS() wl_reasons where so.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = wl_reasons.sponsorshipReasonID)))
*/ set @INSERTEDROWS = @@ROWCOUNT
end
